* A Medium sized vesal entered the atmosphere. It slowed down from it's long 
and fast pursiut of the small ship that it had been after. As it lowered 
into a densely covered forest, a ramp-way extended and touched down, 
spilling an erie blue/green light onto the earth.
* 3 large robots came out, tramping vegitation and any life forms that 
hindered them. The erie light shining off alien metal and into the tropical 
night. They tramped into the darkness and where lost in the jungle, their 
huge clunking boots echoing in the trees, only to be swallowed up by the 
even louder noise of the frightened birds and animals of the bush.
The ship ramp closed and the ship seemed to vanish in the gloomy dark, 
hidden by sofisticated cloaking devices that even the most advanced radar 
wouldn't pick-up. It satthere and waited for its occupants to 
return........*
